name: eoxhub-notebooks
description: MyST project with custom script injection

scripts.build: myst build --html && node inject-scripts.js && python .github/workflows/generate_notebook_list.py && cp notebooks.json _build/html/notebooks.json && cp index.html _build/html/index.html && cp _static/eoxhub_jupyter.jpg _build/html/build/_assets/previews && touch _build/html/.nojekyll
